content: *one of our menagerie of amigurumi animals this little piglet is sure to be a favorite lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 70577ad published in knit 1 skill level easy vanna s choice® article #860 2 colors 1 ball each *shown in pink & rose* crochet hook - size g-6 4 mm split ring stitch markers 2 plastic safety eyes 6 mm diameter fiberfill stuffing some construction required to finish *lion brand yarns requires free registration and log-in to access patterns they are written in u s crochet terminology *
